headline: The Dealmaking 3 – Goldman Buys Excel Sports Stake, Tariffs & Sportswear, Big 12 Moves
summary: This week of The Dealmaking 3 with “The Sports Professor” Rick Horrow features The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (NYSE: GS) purchasing a majority stake of Excel Sports Management for around $1 million and focusing on marketing and adjacent services while preserving the company’s senior management team, Trump’s tariffs not affecting yet sportswear retailers but the […] The post The Dealmaking 3 – Goldman Buys Excel Sports Stake, Tariffs & Sportswear, Big 12 Moves appeared first on CorpGov.

headline: Deckers Outdoor Corporation (DECK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Deckers Outdoor Corporation on Value investing subreddit by StableBread. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DECK. Deckers Outdoor Corporation’s share was trading at $88.03 as of November 28th. DECK’s trailing and forward P/E were 13.08 and 13.99 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
